messages.message: FWIW, I love the guidance in mounting S3 and the external id looks like it is working great! For the list of data mounts it seems like we have better names. If I want to mount multiple S3 buckets for instance, this list would be more useful giving the bucket name somewhere than having to click into config to see which bucket it is.

cc @Natasha

Thanks for the feedback! The need makes a lot of sense. We're thinking about how to generalize this across different data sources as we scale this screen for both search and automation. One idea we're exploring is a side panel with more space for source-specific detailsâ€”would that help with your use case?
